title: DEADLINE TO REQUEST CREDENTIALS TODAY: President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 20, 2009

 



DEADLINE TO REQUEST CREDENTIALS TODAY: President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary    _______________________________________________________________ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                      May 20, 2009    DEADLINE TO REQUEST CREDENTIALS TODAY: President Obama to Deliver Commencement Address at US Naval Academy in Annapolis WASHINGTON, DC – On Friday, May 22, 2009, President Barack Obama will deliver the commencement address at the US Naval Academy in Annapolis, Maryland. All media logistics and credentialing is being handled by the Naval Academy.  For information and credentials, please go to http://www.usna.edu/PAO/vpk09/indexvpk09.htm or contact Jennifer Erickson at (410) 293-2292 or erickson@USNA.edu.  The deadline to request credentials is TODAY, Wednesday, May 20th at 4:00PM EDT. ##
